text: The Mindy Project is an American comedy television show on FOX. It stars Mindy Kaling as Mindy Lahiri, a obstetrician-gynecologist in New York City. == Other websites == * Category:2012 American television series debuts Category:2010s American comedy television series Category:2010s medical television series Category:American medical television series Category:Fox television series Category:Television series set in New York City Category:English-language television programs
title: The Mindy Project
